ygData.subject: RE: AW: [eqbards] Katanas
ygData.msgSnippet: I just got a Icepaw war claw this weekend in Velektors. If you like the freddy kruger look . They are not that bad... 9/24 +3AGI Primary only (could have
ygData.messageBody:
I just got a "Icepaw war claw" this weekend in Velektors. If you like the
freddy kruger look . They are not that bad... 9/24 +3AGI Primary only (could
have been fun to dual wield)

I also got the Kobold Jesters Crown (ac15 cha30 agi5 int-30 dex-5 wt0.0) Not
the perfect item for skill increases, but I think I will use it when
charming. Besides it dont weigh anything, so its "free" to drag around.

Both items dropped in the village. The Crown of a named. and the claws of a
normal kobold I think

Musiker, Bertox

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
> Sent: 20. juli 2001 17:16
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: AW: [eqbards] Katanas
>
>
> You very well maybe right and even if there isnt a low delay
> cap that makes
> other weapons even better, because there IS max haste. 5/24
> + max haste is
> still slower and less dmg then 9/18 + max haste or even 6/23
> which would be
> pathetic as well. The only way I see this weapon being worth
> a flip is if
> its a proc, the proc lasts a descent amount of time, and you
> find yourself
> in a group without a bard/enchanter or shaman. Otherwise I think its
> nothing more than eye candy. Dont get me wrong I like good
> looking gear I
> have a set of wicker armor I wear on my Iksar monk from time
> to time when
> I'm just trying to look "cool" hehe. But unless you are
> rich or really
> just want to look good I think the weapon is going to be over priced.
>
> Still borred at sea for another 2 Months 2X days. : (
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:garramone@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 4:54 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: AW: [eqbards] Katanas
>
>
> It is definitely a twink weapon. The only one I have seen was on a
> twink, and it does look awesome. And I think the low delay
> cap is just
> a rumor, refuted by tests. No not my tests I am too lazy, just from
> what I have read.
>
> Shada/Erisi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 12:21 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: AW: [eqbards] Katanas
>
>
> I think it is trash. 5dmg? That's pathetic. The haste is irrelevant
> as
> you can only have one haste item and one haste "spell" at any given
> time.
> 5dmg is dreadfully low and there is a limit as to how low, even with
> haste,
> the dly on a weapon can be. Max haste isnt that hard to get, and 5/24
> is
> rotten, jade mace 9/18 less than 10k on my server and I am sure lots
> cheaper
> on others. If you are just looking for the looks then maybe
> you will be
> happy with it. But as a weapon for anyone high enough to
> actually group
> and
> get it. You probably already have better.
>
> Mu
>
